ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] MM anyone? (rather longish)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I read about a method involving everyone going into the ballroom invis, standing in one corner and killing the mob there (far enough not aggro the gypsies
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Adam Wasserman wrote:
>
> Thanks Crier.
>
> I'm rather familiar with MM's layout, and I know that secret passage well.
>
> Let me ask this though...
>
> Do you know of any ways to take the room with a party rather than getting a
> level 50 to pull greenies?

I read about a method involving everyone going into the
ballroom invis, standing in one corner and killing the mob
there (far enough not aggro the gypsies or other corner mobs),
repeating for each corner, and then charging the gypsies in
the middle. I've never tried it so your mileage may vary.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
